definitions.body: ] hearing, report (on from cf. Lag:BN 143);—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Is 23:5; cstr. v:Is 23:5 +; sf. [[שִׁמְעִי]] Is 66:19 etc.;—report, usu. c. genit.obj.: acc. with [[שְׁמַע]] Ge 29:13 (J) the tidings about Jacob, Is 23:5 + (c. sf.) Nu 14:15 (JE), De 2:25, 1Ki 10:1= 2Ch 9:1, Na 3:19, Hb Hab 3:2, Je 37:5, Je 50:43, Is 66:9; c. [[ל]] genit. Is 23:5; [[לַעֲדָתָם]] Ho 7:12 usu. according to the report (heard by) their congregation (!), but inexpl. and prob. corrupt, We Now; Marti (cf. Oettli) [[עַל־רָעָתָם]] ([[כְּשֵׁמַע]] as gloss) according to their wickedness; [[שָׁוְא]] ´[[נָשָׂא שׁ]]: Ex 23:1 (E) take up (utter) a false report; [[אׂוָן]] ´[[לְשׁ]]: Ps 18:45 i.e. as soon as heard of, = mere report Job 42:5 (opp. personal knowledge), cf. [[שִׁמְעָהּ]] Job 28:22.
